place.name: LONGFORD
place.gazetteerText: LONGFORD, a village in Exhall parish, Warwick; on the river Anker; adjacent to the Coventry and Nuneaton railway, 4 miles NNE of Coventry. lt has a station on the railway, and a post office under Coventry. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
